name: How i react to spiders that give bitrth
name_original: How i react to spiders that give bitrth
description:
How i react to spiders that give bitrth is a game developed by Fadeaway. It came out on 01-09-2021.
How i react to spiders that give bitrth is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. The game is sold via itch.io.
